page.title: 09Education in the Villages.
page.content: Our school is very nice. We are very lucky to have a lot of wild life in our grounds.We have a big playground, which is marked out for lots of games. We have six classrooms.The teachers names are ,Mrs.James, Mrs.Wilson, Mrs.Bartlett,Mrs. Kitchener, Mrs. Osborn,Mr. Goodall.The school dinners are not bad.The school takes us on lots of school trips.The school took us to Scarborough & Swanage. This year we will be leaving the top class and we will be going to Road school it will be very large to our little school and it will be very sad to leave all our other friends in our class and our teachers who taught us all the work .I hope we will settle down all right with our new friends. Sometimes people get a bit scared of getting lost. Alex Martin Aged 11.
